function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharp decline at the end of March followed by a rise in April and May","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission if lockdown restrictions are eased","Mitigation":"Maintain strict lockdown measures, increase testing and contact tracing","Technologies":"Testing and contact tracing technology","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Rising trend in online shopping and credit card usage","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Encourage contactless payment methods, promote online shopping with home delivery","Technologies":"Contactless payment technology, online delivery services","People":"Consumers, retail workers","Owner":"Retailers, payment technology companies"},{"Description":"Banks giving importance to protecting loans and assets","Impact":"Risk of economic instability and financial crisis if loans are not properly protected","Mitigation":"Implement robust risk management strategies, provide financial support to businesses and individuals","Technologies":"Risk management software, financial support systems","People":"Banking sector, businesses, individuals","Owner":"Banks, financial regulators"}]}
